com.viaoa.jfc.editor.html.view

Class PrintBoxView

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.text.View
      • javax.swing.text.CompositeView
        • javax.swing.text.BoxView
          • com.viaoa.jfc.editor.html.view.PrintBoxView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SwingConstants

    public class PrintBoxView
extends BoxView
    This is the rootView for creating a fixed width OAHTMLTextPane that is going to be printed. OAHTMLTextPane.print()/preview() will create this, giving a width, so that all child views will be laid out fit within the width. Also, all images, which use MyImageView, will be scaled to fit.

    • Field Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getContainer

        public Container getContainer()
        vv hack This is needed to returned a component for the child views, else a NPE can happen when a view calls StyleSheet.paint(view) and it does not have a container. Can not return the editor, since other views call it to get the container width, which needs to be the width for this boxView, and not the editor.
        Overrides:
        getContainer in class View
